Uses of Package
org.xlattice.node

  • Packages that use org.xlattice.node 
    Package Description
    org.xlattice.node  
    org.xlattice.node.nodereg  
  • Classes in org.xlattice.node used by org.xlattice.node 
    Class and Description
    AbstractNode
    Implementation of a basic XLattice Node.
    CNodeCtl
    Control block used by Runner to manage a CNode, an XLattice node running on a host reachable by UDP (in this implementation).
    Compost
    XXX NEED TO REVIEW THIS FOR MULTI-THREADING XXX
    JNode
    Represents a Node which will be run in a separate JVM (Java virtual machine) by the runner creating an instance of this class.
    JNodeCtl
    Control block used by Runner to manage a JNode running in a separate JVM but on the same host.
    NattedOverlay
    An overlay which uses UDP and a NATted address.
    NodeConfig
    Holder for Node configuration information, for use with org.xlattice.corexml.bind.
    OverlayConfig
    The Overlay specification from the Node's XML configuration file.
    Port0Handler 
    Port0Handler.Pinger 
    RSAInfo
    Deprecated. 
    This functionality has been moved to org.xlattice.crypto.
    TNode
    Represents a Node which executes in a separate thread within the same JVM as as the runner.
  • Classes in org.xlattice.node used by org.xlattice.node.nodereg 
    Class and Description
    RSAInfo
    Deprecated. 
    This functionality has been moved to org.xlattice.crypto.
